metadata.synopsis: Party finds Viconia's books on Shadowheart

0.speaker: Player
0.text: These are all about me... forty years of my life, documented like I was some sort of specimen.
0.context: NodeContext: Shock/dismay. Reacting to discovering the 'school reports' on her years of indoctrination by the sharrans.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: These volumes... they're all about Shadowheart. Years of training and tutelage.
